SectionBody.Text: The custodian shall transfer in an appropriate manner the custodial property to the minor or to the minor’s estate upon the earlier of:

Subsection.Text: The minor’s attainment of 21 years of age with respect to custodial property transferred under s. 710.105 or s. 710.106;
The minor’s attainment of age 18 with respect to custodial property transferred under s. 710.107 or s. 710.108; or
